mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes the articles entitled "Square Dancing at Christmas", "It's Refreshment Time...", "Mr. Square Dancer's Wardrobe", "One Year Later, Sets In Order, The Record Square Festival", This edition also includes the monthly articles entitled "On the Record", "The Square of the Month", "Idea Corral", "Round the Outside Ring" and "From the Floor" (letters to the editor). The article "Spotlighting Six Up and Coming Callers" is a featured article about six callers: Arnie Kronenberger, Ross Christiansoh, Tex Crum, Tim Garrett, Orrin Benedict, and John Donhoff who are considered a "good caller" from Southern California .
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
